description: This Dart file defines the NoteRepository class, which provides an interface for managing notes, including fetching, searching, adding, updating, and deleting notes through a data access object (NoteDao).

classes.name: NoteRepository
classes.description: A repository class that encapsulates data access logic for notes, serving as an intermediary between the data source and the application.

methods.name: getNotes
methods.description: Retrieves all notes ordered by the most recently updated.

methods.name: searchNotes
methods.description: Searches for notes containing the query string in either title or content.

methods.name: deleteNote
methods.description: Deletes a note identified by its ID.
